name: enframe
description: Enframe facilitates rapid application creation and continued maintainance.
author: Austin Gatlin <austin@gatlin.io>

scripts.c: yarn bundle && yarn addEnv && chmod 755 bin/enframe.js
scripts.addEnv:
echo '#! /usr/bin/env node
' | cat - bin/enframe.js > temp && mv temp bin/enframe.js
